forecast-period.text: Wind gusts can be 40 percent stronger than the averages given here. Wind warnings are issued for today and tomorrow and describe the highest category of wind warning for that day.
Winds: South to southwesterly 5 to 15 knots. Weather: Cloudy. 50% chance of showers this morning.
Winds: East to southeasterly below 10 knots becoming southerly in the middle of the day then becoming east to southeasterly in the late evening. Weather: Partly cloudy.
Winds: Variable below 10 knots. Weather: Partly cloudy.
Winds: Variable below 10 knots. Weather: Mostly sunny.
Winds: South to southwesterly 10 to 15 knots decreasing to below 10 knots in the early afternoon. Weather: Partly cloudy.
Winds: South to southwesterly below 10 knots becoming southeasterly in the middle of the day then becoming east to northeasterly in the evening. Weather: Mostly sunny.
Winds: Variable below 10 knots. Weather: Partly cloudy.
Winds: Northerly about 10 knots. Weather: Partly cloudy.

Winds: Southwesterly 10 to 20 knots, reaching 25 knots in the south in the morning, decreasing to 10 to 15 knots in the evening. Seas: 1 to 2 metres, decreasing to 1 to 1.5 metres during the afternoon. Weather: Cloudy. 50% chance of showers.

Winds: Southwesterly 10 to 15 knots tending southerly in the middle of the day then decreasing to below 10 knots in the late evening. Seas: Below 1 metre. Weather: Partly cloudy. 20% chance of a shower.
Winds: Variable about 10 knots. Seas: Below 1 metre. Weather: Partly cloudy. 20% chance of a shower.

Winds: North to northeasterly about 10 knots tending east to northeasterly 15 to 20 knots during the afternoon then becoming north to northeasterly about 10 knots during the evening. Seas: Around 1 metre. Weather: Sunny.

Winds: Southwesterly 15 to 25 knots decreasing to 15 to 20 knots in the afternoon and to about 10 knots in the late evening. Seas: 1 to 2 metres, decreasing to 1 metre during the afternoon. Weather: Cloudy. 60% chance of showers.
Winds: West to southwesterly about 10 knots tending southerly 10 to 15 knots in the middle of the day. Seas: Below 1 metre. Weather: Cloudy. 20% chance of a shower.
Winds: West to southwesterly below 10 knots becoming south to southeasterly during the day. Seas: Below 1 metre. Weather: Partly cloudy. 30% chance of a shower.

Winds: North to northwesterly about 10 knots tending northeast to southeasterly 10 to 15 knots during the day then becoming variable about 10 knots during the evening. Seas: Below 1 metre. Weather: Mostly sunny.

Winds: Southwesterly 20 to 30 knots decreasing to 15 to 25 knots in the middle of the day. Seas: 2 to 3 metres, decreasing to 1.5 to 2 metres during the afternoon. Weather: Cloudy. 70% chance of showers.
Winds: Southwesterly 10 to 15 knots turning south to southeasterly below 10 knots during the afternoon and evening. Seas: Around 1 metre. Weather: Cloudy. 20% chance of a shower.
Winds: Variable about 10 knots. Seas: Below 1 metre. Weather: Partly cloudy. 20% chance of a shower.

Winds: North to northeasterly about 10 knots tending east to northeasterly 15 to 20 knots during the day. Seas: Below 1 metre, increasing to around 1 metre during the afternoon. Weather: Mostly sunny.

area.description: Frederick Henry Bay and Norfolk Bays

forecast-period.text: Winds: Southwesterly 20 to 30 knots decreasing to 15 to 25 knots in the middle of the day. Seas: 1.5 to 2.5 metres, decreasing to 1 to 1.5 metres during the afternoon. Weather: Cloudy. 60% chance of showers.
Winds: Southwesterly 10 to 15 knots turning south to southeasterly in the afternoon. Seas: Around 1 metre. Weather: Cloudy. 20% chance of a shower.
Winds: Variable about 10 knots. Seas: Below 1 metre. Weather: Partly cloudy. 20% chance of a shower.
Winds: North to northeasterly below 10 knots tending easterly 10 to 15 knots during the day then tending northeasterly during the evening. Seas: Below 1 metre. Weather: Mostly sunny.
